title: What song has a better acoustic version? - Quora

response.answer_text: Obviously anything like that is apt to be a subjective judgment; what I consider ‘better’ may not be the same as yours. A complicating factor is that often the acoustic version comes out once you have already heard the original version enough for it to be commonplace, and as such retains novelty value - so it may feel like it’s ‘better’ just because of that. However, with those disclaimers in mind… there are a few. The one which most fits for me would be Radiohead’s “Creep”. There is an acoustic version on the ‘My Iron Lung’ EP which, to me, is far more enjoyable than the original one from the ‘Pablo Honey’ album.
